availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: Flat Storage Box: 11th Ky Cav (US) Muster Rolls, Bundle 7

body.p:
Headquarters Department of the Ohio,
Knoxville, Tenn., April 12th 1864.
SPECIAL ORDERS,
No. 103 }
4. The resignation of 2nd Lt. Geo. J. Burgess, 11 Ky. Cavy Volutneers, tendered on account of Physical disability is hereby accepted to take effect April 15th 1864.
Any balance of pay due him at that time, will be suspended until satisfactory evidence is furnished to the Paymaster, that he is not indebted to the United States Government.

BY COMMAND OF MAJOR GENERAL FOSTER ^Schofield^:
R. Morrow
Assistant Adjutant General.

11th Cavy
Burgess John George J.
2 Lieut
Order accepting Resignation
Recd A. G. O. April 20. 1864
